Trapped in the Matrix: How TikTok, Shorts, and Reels are destroying your mind
description: Short-form video wasn’t supposed to become our generation’s Matrix, yet here we are, scrolling ourselves into a new cognitive baseline. Drawing on Feeds, Feelings and Focus, a meta-analysis of 71 studies and nearly 100,000 people, this piece maps how TikTok, Reels and Shorts quietly retrain the mind. Attention thins, emotions accelerate, adults prove no more resilient than teenagers, autonomy erodes in micro-increments, and identity becomes whatever narrative the algorithm reflects back. No machines, no pods, no cables — just a device we willingly consult. The dreamworld didn’t need to trap us. We walked in, thumb first, without noticing the door.

title: Chiefs vs Texans: Mahomes hits fantasy trap as Rashee Rice eyes breakout

description: Repeatedly heating cooking oil triggers chemical changes, leading to the formation of harmful compounds that compromise its safety and nutritional value. This degradation can increase the risk of certain cancers and negatively impact cardiovascular and metabolic health over time. Practicing safe frying techniques and being aware of oil's warning signs are crucial for mitigating these risks.

title: South Africa shooting: Gunmen open fire at illegal Pretoria bar; 12 killed
description: Gunmen opened fire at an illegal bar in Pretoria's Saulsville township early Saturday, killing at least 12 people, including a three-year-old child and two teenagers. Police reported 25 people were shot in the indiscriminate attack, which is the latest in a string of mass shootings plaguing South Africa. The motive is unknown, and a manhunt is underway for the suspects.

description: Aviation Ministry has imposed emergency fare caps on domestic flights to combat soaring ticket prices following widespread cancellations by a major airline. These temporary restrictions aim to protect passengers from exploitation and ensure travel affordability until the situation stabilizes.

The incident, which occurred during peak morning hours, caused significant inconvenience to thousands of passengers. Police are investigating the incident, with preliminary reports suggesting depression as a possible motive.

Rottweilers maul woman to death in Karnataka: Victim bitten in ‘50 places’
description: A 38-year-old woman was fatally mauled by two rottweilers on the outskirts of Davanagere. The victim was attacked while walking home late at night. CCTV footage shows individuals releasing the dogs shortly before the incident, leading to suspicions of foul play and a demand for a thorough investigation.

title: India–Russia Summit: Defence ties shift from buyer–seller roles to joint players; what was discussed
Conor McGregor calls out Islam Makhachev as he targets UFC 170-lb belt next
description: Conor McGregor eyes a UFC comeback in June 2025 at a White House event. He aims for Islam Makhachev's welterweight belt, seeking a historic triple crown. McGregor is training intensely. He also remains open to a fight with Michael Chandler. Contract talks are expected by February 2025. The UFC is finalizing plans for this significant return.

title: Rs 970 crore scam: How 400–500 investors across India and Dubai were duped
description: Kanpur police have arrested Ravindra Nath Soni, a Delhi-based businessman. He allegedly ran a massive international investment scam. Hundreds of Indians in India and Dubai were duped of nearly ₹970 crore. The fraud involves cryptocurrency laundering and hawala routes. Investigators are examining national security implications. Soni floated shell companies promising high returns. He is now in judicial custody.

title: Reverse Kidney Damage: A breakthrough treatment transform kidney treatment
description: A groundbreaking discovery offers hope for reversing kidney damage, challenging the notion that it's irreversible. Researchers found that blocking ceramides, fats linked to kidney cell injury, protected and restored normal function in animal trials. This breakthrough could shift kidney disease treatment from slowing decline to actively restoring health, potentially reducing the need for dialysis and transplantation.

title: Delhi: Cabbie stabbed to death for refusing ride to India Gate for birthday celebration
description: A cab driver was fatally stabbed by four individuals, including three minors, near Hazrat Nizamuddin after refusing them a joyride. The group, celebrating a criminal's birthday, attacked the driver when he declined their demand. Police apprehended the suspects after reviewing CCTV footage, recovering the stolen car and murder weapon.

title: ‘Metaverse’ budget cut: Zuckerberg plans slash resources; company loses $70 billion
description: Meta is reportedly planning to significantly cut its Metaverse budget by up to 30% for 2026, signaling a potential shift away from its virtual reality ambitions. This move follows substantial losses and a lack of consumer interest in its VR products. The company is now prioritizing its artificial intelligence initiatives.

title: Sabalenka & Frangulis net worth: Earnings, endorsements and ventures
description: Tennis star Aryna Sabalenka and her boyfriend, Oakberry founder Georgios Frangulis, are a financially successful couple. Sabalenka boasts a net worth in the high teens of millions from her WTA career and endorsements, while Frangulis's stake in his rapidly expanding açaí company places him in the multi-million-dollar range. Their combined wealth is estimated to be in the tens of millions.

title: Private bedroom CCTV hacked: Surat woman’s video leaked online; couple faces trauma
description: A Surat couple is in distress after intimate videos of the wife, recorded by home CCTV cameras, went viral online. The incident raises concerns about the security of home surveillance systems. Police are investigating potential hacking or unauthorized sharing of the footage, with cases registered under the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita and IT Act.
